00009  * Virtual Keys, Standard Set
00010  */

00012 #define VK_RBUTTON        0x02
00013 #define VK_CANCEL         0x03

00047 
00048 /* VK_0 thru VK_9 are the same as ASCII '0' thru '9' (0x30 - 0x39) */
00049 /* VK_A thru VK_Z are the same as ASCII 'A' thru 'Z' (0x41 - 0x5A) */
00050 #define VK_0              0x30
00051 #define VK_1              0x31
00052 #define VK_2              0x32
00053 #define VK_3              0x33

00055 #define VK_5              0x35
00056 #define VK_6              0x36
00057 #define VK_7              0x37
00058 #define VK_8              0x38
00059 #define VK_9              0x39

00139 /*
00140  * VK_L* & VK_R* - left and right Alt, Ctrl and Shift virtual keys.
00141  * Used only as parameters to GetAsyncKeyState() and GetKeyState().
00142  * No other API or message will distinguish left and right keys in this way.
00143  */
00144 #define VK_LSHIFT         0xA0
00145 #define VK_RSHIFT         0xA1
00146 #define VK_LCONTROL       0xA2
00147 #define VK_RCONTROL       0xA3
00148 #define VK_LMENU          0xA4
00149 #define VK_RMENU          0xA5
00150 
00151 #define VK_ATTN           0xF6
00152 #define VK_CRSEL          0xF7
00153 #define VK_EXSEL          0xF8
00154 #define VK_EREOF          0xF9
00155 #define VK_PLAY           0xFA
00156 #define VK_ZOOM           0xFB
00157 #define VK_NONAME         0xFC
00158 #define VK_PA1            0xFD
00159 #define VK_OEM_CLEAR      0xFE
